item.title: Setting NTFS permissions using Powershell
item.description: I am currently working on a script similar to the Mass import of users in Active Direcory post I published earlier (as promised ðŸ™‚ ). In the new script I wanted to only use powershell, so I had to find a way to set ntfs permissions using powershell. After all, the cacls way is pretty outdated. After some googling I came up with a rather extensive script, it is a little more complicated than I wanted but here goes:
